articles.title: Coronavirus France: Kawasaki-like linked disease kills boy, 9 - Daily Mail
articles.description: The boy died on Saturday at a hospital in Marseille from brain trauma caused by a cardiac arrest after suffering symptoms similar to Kawasaki disease and having been diagnosed with coronavirus.
articles.content:
A nine-year-old boy has died in France from a Kawasaki-like disease believed to be linked to coronavirus.
It is the first death of its kind in France following similar child fatalities that are being investigated in London and New York.
